amendment.description: Amendment clarifies GAO report requirements and includes the Lawrence Livermore, Sandia, and Los Alomos National Laboratories and the Y-12 Plant to the list of laboratories which prohibit citizens of certain foreign nations from entering classified areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 3 printed in the Congressional Record to clarify GAO report requirements and include the Lawrence Livermore, Sandia, and Los Alomos national laboratories and the Y-12 Plant to the list of laboratories which prohibit citizens of certain foreign nations from entering classified areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
